scripts.install::darwin:linux: cd desktop-idle && HOME=~/.electron-gyp node-gyp rebuild --target=4.2.8 --arch=x64 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/electron --python=python2.7 && cd ..
scripts.install:win32: cd desktop-idle && node-gyp rebuild --python=python2.7  --target=4.2.8 --arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers && cd ..\ && npm install ffi --python=python2.7  --target=4.2.8 --arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers && npm install iconv --python=python2.7  --target=4.2.8 --arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers && npm install ref --python=python2.7  --target=4.2.8 --arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers && npm install ref-wchar --python=python2.7 && npm install ref-struct --python=python2.7 && echo 'this is a test'
scripts.rebuild::darwin:linux: cd desktop-idle && HOME=~/.electron-gyp node-gyp rebuild --target=4.2.8 --arch=x64 --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/electron --python=python2.7 && cd ..
scripts.rebuild:win32: cd desktop-idle && node-gyp rebuild --python=python2.7  --target=4.2.8 --arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers && cd ..\ && npm install ffi --python=python2.7  --target=4.2.8 --arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers && npm install iconv --python=python2.7  --target=4.2.8 --arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers && npm install ref --python=python2.7  --target=4.2.8 --arch=ia32 --dist-url=https://electronjs.org/headers && npm install ref-wchar --python=python2.7 && npm install ref-struct --python=python2.7 && echo 'this is a test'
